charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was training in the
forest one day when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] ran into Leaf.
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1201_0200_1:
Hey! Are you free right now? We should have a
Pokémon battle!
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1101_0300_2:
Leaf gave [Name:PlayerNickname ] a confident
smile, to which [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] nodded in agreement.
One does not refuse a challenge from Leaf!
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1101_0400_2:
The two of them fought hard alongside their
partners, smiling and cheering until the battle
came to a close.
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1201_0600_1: Are you two doing OK? You look a little tired.
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1201_0700_1:
I still feel like I’m bursting with energy! Venusaur
and I have been nonstop ever since I got my
sygna suit.
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1201_1200_1:
It’s weird—when I’m wearing my sygna suit, I feel
closer to Venusaur than ever!
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1201_1300_1:
*sniff sniff* Do you smell that? I think Venusaur is
letting out a Sweet Scent.
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1201_1400_1: Maybe it’s about time for a little break!
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_0401_1600_1:
Hehe, curious about Venusaur’s mysterious scent,
are you?
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_0402_1800_1:
Doesn’t it?! She smells so floral and sweet today.
Venusaur’s just the best!
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1201_1900_1:
Did you know that her flower’s scent can calm and
soothe the human heart?
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1201_2000_1: It’s also known to attract all sorts of Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1201_2100_1:
Sometimes we turn around and find flocks of them
following us...
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1201_2200_1:
Wait a minute... What’s this? Did Venusaur’s scent
bring you here, little guy?
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1201_2300_1:
I don’t see its Trainer anywhere... Do you think it
could be lost?
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1201_2400_1:
I’ll be right back. I’m gonna go try to find
its Trainer!
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1201_2500_1:
Don’t worry! You can stay here and finish up your
break. You’re tired after that battle, right?
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1201_2600_1:
Besides, this little guy’s Trainer might come here
looking for it! If someone shows up, just ask them
to wait here, OK?
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1201_2800_1:
After a few laps around the forest, that Pokémon
and I managed to find its Trainer!
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1201_2900_1:
They looked so happy to be together again.
Seeing them reunited totally reignited my energy!
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_0301_3000_1: I’m so glad you found them!
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_0401_3100_1:
Me too! A sync pair’s not a sync pair if both
halves aren’t together, after all!
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_0302_3200_1: How do you have so much energy?
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_0402_3300_1:
You want to know my secret? It’s simple! I just
love Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1201_3400_1:
That reminds me, we never got to finish our
conversation about Venusaur’s scent!
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1201_3500_1:
The Sweet Scent we smelled earlier was actually
Venusaur’s way of telling us we should take
a break.
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1201_3600_1:
She’s such a sweetie—always looking out for me
and other Trainers. And other Pokémon, too!
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1201_3700_1:
And she’s so dependable in a battle! Especially
when it comes to healing and protecting her allies
when they’re in a tough spot.
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1201_3800_1:
Her strength isn’t just about having powerful
attacks—it’s about protecting what’s important
to her!
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1201_3900_1:
That’s actually why I partnered up with Venusaur.
I want to learn how to protect others just like
she does.
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_0301_4000_1: You were lucky to find her.
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_0401_4100_1:
I think it was fate that brought us together!
I wished that Venusaur and I could be partners
with all of my heart.
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_0402_4300_1:
I think it was fate that brought us together!
I wished that Venusaur and I could be partners
with all of my heart.
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1201_4400_1:
And then, miraculously, Venusaur agreed—and
that was it!
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1201_4500_1:
It’s weird! Now whenever I feel the need to
protect others or care for them, I get this big rush
of energy from within me!
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1201_4600_1:
Venusaur and I were running around looking after
some other sync pairs the day the sygna suit
designer gave me this.
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1201_4700_1:
He must have been inspired by how much we
wanted to protect others.
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1201_4800_1:
Now that I have an outfit that perfectly matches
Venusaur, I feel like I can be stronger than ever!
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1201_4900_1:
We’ll be the sweetest, kindest, strongest sync pair
out there, ready to protect our team whenever
they need us! You’ll see!
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_0401_5100_1:
Hehe, you bet!
In the meantime, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_0402_5300_1:
Hehe, you bet!
In the meantime, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
charaepi_ch0017_10_leaf/2301_1201_5400_1:
How about another battle?! Come on, let’s do
some training together!
